objects.text:
• 65 Hours Playtime
• 6 Music EQ Modes
• HiFi Stereo Sound
• Comfortable Design

product_details.description: 🔥【Optional 6 music modes】Adopted most advanced dual 40mm dynamic sound unit and 6 EQ modes, BERIBES updated headphones wireless bluetooth red were born for audiophiles. Simply switch the headphone between balanced sound, extra powerful bass and mid treble enhancement modes. No matter you prefer rock, Jazz, Rhythm & Blues or classic music, BERIBES Bluetooth Headphones Over the Ear has always been committed to providing our customers with better sound quality as the focal point of our engineering . 🔥【65 Hours Playtime】Low power consumption technology applied, BERIBES bluetooth headphones with built-in 500mAh battery can continually play more than 65 hours, standby more than 950 hours after one fully charge. By included 3.5mm audio cable, the wireless headphones over ear can be easily switched to wired mode when powers off. No power shortage problem anymore. 🔥【All Day Comfort】Made by premium materials, 0.38lb BERIBES over the ear headphones wireless bluetooth for work are the most lightweight headphones in the market. Adjustable headband makes it easy to fit all sizes heads without pains. Softer and more comfortable memory protein earmuffs protect your ear in long term using. 🔥【Latest Bluetooth 5.3 and Microphone】Carrying latest Bluetooth 5.3 chip, after booting, 1-3 seconds to quickly pair bluetooth. Beribes bluetooth headphones with microphone has faster and more stable transmitter range up to 33ft. Two smart devices can be connected to Beribes over-ear headphones at the same time, makes you able to pick up a call from your phone when watching movie on your iPad without switching. 🔥【After Sale Protection】Package include a Foldable Deep Bass Headphone,3.5mm backup audio cable, USB charging cable and User Manual. Provide one year money back guarantee and three year warranty, lifetime worry free user support, contact us anytime if you have any questions about our wireless headphones bluetooth, we will reply within 10 hours. Brand - BERIBES ** Color - Orange red ** Ear Placement - Over Ear ** Form Factor - Over Ear ** Headphones Jack - 3.5 mm Jack **

banner_details:
This vibrant banner features a promotional layout for wireless headphones, combining engaging visuals with bold typography. The banner uses a soft, gradient background enhanced by subtle circular and linear design elements for added depth. A large image of the product dominates the right half, drawing attention. To the left, a primary headline with the id `heading` appears in bold black font, conveying a premium tone, while the secondary text layer `subheading` in uppercase and vivid coral red highlights comfort features. Descriptive bullet points below (`description`) summarize product benefits. The price (`price`) is clearly marked in bold, and a call-to-action button (`cta_button_bg` and `cta`) labeled with compelling white text over a standout coral-red background invites purchase action.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Peach (#FFF5F3)
- Bold Coral Red (#FF5A4D / #FF6B61)
- Light Coral (#FF8878)
- Deep Charcoal (#212121)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a vibrant and cohesive coral color palette that evokes energy and modernity. The primary hue is a bold coral orange (#F76C5E), applied uniformly across the headphones, offering a visually striking presence. Subtle highlights and shadows bring in gradients of peach (#FA8A76) and deep coral (#E05243), adding dimension and a premium finish. The small blue LED light (#3BA1D2) on the earcup contrasts effectively, drawing attention without overpowering the main color. The clean white logo text (#FFFFFF) provides crisp readability. These colors blend seamlessly, while strategic lighting highlights curves and textures for a dynamic, eye-catching advertisement layout.
